title: Do you still get season rewards if you have a 14 day ban?
body: So yeah, I got a 14 day ban for the things I have said. Honestly shouldn't have said anything, and should have muted the players tilting me. But anyways, season ends November, and I hear that you don't receive rewards if you get banned 3 months prior to season end. It's only June, and I have received a ban. Will I still receive rewards? Thank you.

replies.body: You're right about the 14-day ban disqualifying you from [**season rewards**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/228380727) if it happens within 3 months of the season ending. Also keep in mind that if you have a suspension or chat restriction when the season ends, you won't be eligible for those rewards either.

You **should** be okay as long as you don't get another one later on. I'm not 100% sure just yet when the official end of 2017 Season is, but I believe it might be ending sometime around November.

Hey man, I got suspended for 14 days on August 4th, am I still eligible for my diamond bored? I know it doesn't matter, but I roasted my IRL friend in team chat and he reported me as a joke. Feelsbadman :/

Ayyyyy we finally got the official word on end-of-season rewards! It looks like the hard cutoff for being eligible for rewards is 8/22/2017. If you have a ban lasting 7 days or more on or after that date, you will not be eligible. Players banned specifically for boosting are not eligible if they were punished during this season. 

You can also read through the bullets yourself over on the [**2017 Ranked Rewards Eligibility FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068).
